content: The dental interop topic will be a part of the HL7 WGM discussions next week in San Antonio. HERE is a link to the planned report outs - and FHIR will be a key component. If you are there and want to talk ... give me a ping!

To be sure, discussing the area of dental interoperability with numerous stakeholders and experts since last September's Baltimore meetings, there is value under every rock - even for dentist-to-dentist ... and it definitely represents a huge area of information that is currently off the digital healthcare map - on "roadmaps" off in the future somewhere, but no where near having real work done anytime soon. This project should change that, though!
